original_text: Speak ye unto all the congregation of Israel, saying, In the tenth day of this month they shall take to them every man a lamb, according to the house of their fathers, a lamb for an house:
korean_text: 너희는 이스라엘 온 회중에게 말하여 이르라 이 달 열흘에 너희 각자가 어린 양을 잡을지니 각 가족대로 그 식구를 위하여 어린 양을 취하되

sentences.original_text: Speak ye unto all the congregation of Israel
In the tenth day of this month
they shall take to them every man a lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 각 사람이 어린 양을 취할지니

sentences.original_text: according to the house of their fathers
